description:
An old man saves a broken swallow, who rewards him with a magic watermelon seed.  A man encounters a terrifying ghost at a haunted stream.  A traveling priest visits a village where an evil dragon is devouring virgin sacrifices.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Swallow with the Broken Leg / Left Behind / The Legend of the Nine-Headed Dragon
足折れ燕 / おいてけ堀 / 九頭竜伝説
